title: S12 Ep42: Deathbed Visits, Angelic Visions and Crossings to the Other Side
itunes:title: Deathbed Visits, Angelic Visions and Crossings to the Other Side
description:
Beyond The Darkness welcomes Josie Varga to the show. As the dying prepare to leave this world, they often begin to get a glimpse of what lies beyond through deathbed visits from deceased loved ones, strangers, and angelic or divine figures.

Josie Varga: https://www.josievarga.com/
itunes:summary: Beyond The Darkness welcomes Josie Varga to the show.  As the dying prepare to leave this world, they often begin to get a glimpse of what lies beyond through deathbed visits from deceased loved ones, strangers, and angelic or divine figures....
